item.title: Using Visual Studio Code (with 5 Recommended Extensions)
item.description: I constantly toy with which IDE/Text Editor I want to use in my workflow. I’ve tried six or seven in the last few months to find something that fits my personal work flow and always ended up reverting to Sublime Text 3. I require my editor to be customisable, is extendable and has support for colour schemes (it’s the little things). When I stumbled on Visual Studio (VS) Code recently and found that it and ticked all of my boxes, I decided to dive in and test it out.
